citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 10:45am on
February 8, 2024. The APHIS official knocked on the door and was told by a relative that the licensee was not home and
would not be available for several hours.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b)  Repeat
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 10:45am on 
February 8, 2024. The APHIS official knocked on the door and was told by a relative that the licensee was not home and 
would not be available for several hours. 
 
 
End Section
